title: FTP Misconfiguration Mayhem
description: Exploit the misconfigured FTP server to capture the flag
hints: Try connecting to the FTP server using anonymous login
Look for directories and files that shouldn't be publicly accessible
Remember, not all files are meant to be read in text mode
learningObjectives: Understand the risks associated with FTP misconfigurations
Learn to identify and exploit common FTP server misconfigurations
Practice working with FTP commands and navigating FTP servers
